name: Rolling Stone (tksi)
description:
• Side scroller crosses Japanese Fireworks (Hanabi)
  • Submission for #WowieJam3!

Controls
  • Mouse button down - Charge power
  • Mouse button up - Explode!
Tips
  • Charge power gained through rolling down hills
  • The more upwards velocity & charge power, bigger the fireworks.  Try exploding when the player is climing up hills.
